articles.author: Johanna Romero
articles.title: Apple iPhone 18 Pro’s display rumored to look radically different by ditching a key feature - PhoneArena
articles.description: Reports point to a significant display redesign for 2026 Pro models, hiding key tech and potentially altering the Dynamic Island.
articles.content:
